entries.title: James McDivitt, commander of pivotal NASA missions, dies at 93
entries.description: The astronaut’s missions, including the first successful American spacewalk mission, helped NASA eventually get to the moon.

entries.title: Apple’s new entry-level iPad just got more expensive
entries.description: The colorful new iPad packs a lot of overdue changes -- but it'll cost you more than usual.

entries.title: Blizzard Albany, formerly Vicarious Visions, gets union vote greenlight
entries.description: The National Labor Relations Board ruled that a group of 21 quality assurance testers at Blizzard Albany could vote in a union election.

entries.title: Tensions rise in India over claim that Instagram let ruling party tamper with posts
entries.description: The Wire, a small but gutsy news outlet, is investigating its own reporting amid an explosive dispute with Meta.

entries.title: Buffalo massacre report calls for punishing homicide livestreams
entries.description: Letitia James’s (D) investigation marks one of the most significant efforts by U.S. law enforcement to examine the role of the internet in mass shootings.

entries.title: Microsoft lays off employees in Xbox, wargame simulation divisions
entries.description: Tech companies are tightening their belts in response to economic headwinds.
